PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProtectiveDeviceTrippingUnitTypeElectroMagnetic
PropertySetDef.Definition: Information on tripping units that are electrically or magnetically tripped.

PropertyDef.Name: ElectroMagneticTrippingUnitType
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available types of electric magnetic tripping unit from which that required may be selected. These cover overload, none special, short circuit, motor protection and bi-metal tripping.

PropertyDef.Name: I1
PropertyDef.Definition: The (thermal) lower testing current limit in [x In], indicating that for currents lower than I1, the tripping time shall be longer than the associated tripping time, T2.

PropertyDef.Name: I2
PropertyDef.Definition: The (thermal) upper testing current limit in [x In], indicating that for currents larger than I2, the tripping time shall be shorter than the associated tripping time, T2.

PropertyDef.Name: T2
PropertyDef.Definition: The (thermal) testing time in [s] associated with the testing currents I1 and I2.

PropertyDef.Name: DefinedTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: The ambient temperature at which the thermal current/time-curve associated with this protection device is defined.

PropertyDef.Name: TemperatureFactor
PropertyDef.Definition: The correction factor (typically measured as %/deg K) for adjusting the thermal current/time to an ambient temperature different from the value given by the defined temperature.

PropertyDef.Name: I4
PropertyDef.Definition: The lower electromagnetic testing current limit in [x In], indicating that for currents lower than I4, the tripping time shall be longer than the associated tripping time, T5, i.e. the device shall not trip instantaneous.

PropertyDef.Name: I5
PropertyDef.Definition: The upper electromagnetic testing current limit in [x In], indicating that for currents larger than I5, the tripping time shall be shorter than or equal to the associated tripping time, T5, i.e. the device shall trip instantaneous.

PropertyDef.Name: T5
PropertyDef.Definition: The electromagnetic testing time in [s] associated with the testing currents I4 and I5, i.e. electromagnetic tripping time

PropertyDef.Name: CurveDesignation
PropertyDef.Definition: The designation of the trippingcurve given by the manufacturer. For a MCB the designation should be in accordance with the designations given in IEC 60898.
